statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username, age FROM player_profiles WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT id, username, region FROM player_profiles WHERE skill_level='Intermediate';
SELECT username, age, skill_level FROM player_profiles WHERE region='North America' AND skill_level='Advanced';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, age FROM player_profiles WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, username, region FROM player_profiles WHERE skill_level = 'Expert' ORDER BY region, id DESC;
SELECT id, username, age, region FROM player_profiles ORDER BY age DESC, region ASC;
SELECT id, skill_level, region FROM player_profiles WHERE age IS NULL ORDER BY skill_level;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE age > 25
SELECT username, region FROM players WHERE skill_level='Beginner'
SELECT id, skill_level FROM players ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE win_rate > 0.5
SELECT username, games_played, win_rate FROM players INNER JOIN player_stats ON players.id = player_stats.player_id
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT username, age, region FROM players WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT id, username, age FROM players WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, wins, losses, win_rate FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 100 ORDER BY win_rate DESC;
SELECT p.username, ps.wins, ps.losses, ps.win_rate FROM players p JOIN player_stats ps ON p.id = ps.player_id WHERE p.skill_level = 'Expert';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, age FROM player_profiles WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT id, username, age, skill_level FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM player_stats ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT player_id, login_date, last_played_date FROM player_history WHERE player_id=100;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT username, region FROM player_profiles WHERE skill_level = 'Pro' AND region = 'NA';
SELECT player_profiles.username, player_stats.games_played FROM player_profiles JOIN player_stats ON player_profiles.id = player_stats.player_id WHERE player_stats.wins > player_stats.losses;
SELECT player_profiles.username, player_history.login_date FROM player_profiles JOIN player_history ON player_profiles.id = player_history.player_id WHERE player_history.last_played_date IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM player_profiles WHERE skill_level = 'Casual';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, age, region FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 18;
SELECT * FROM player_stats ORDER BY win_rate DESC;
SELECT username, age, skill_level FROM player_profiles WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT friend_id, player_id FROM player_friends WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_stats.wins, player_stats.losses FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_stats ON player_profiles.id = player_stats.player_id WHERE player_stats.win_rate > 0.75 ORDER BY player_stats.wins DESC;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_stats.games_played, player_stats.win_rate FROM player_profiles LEFT JOIN player_stats ON player_profiles.id = player_stats.player_id WHERE player_stats.games_played > 100 ORDER BY player_stats.win_rate DESC, player_profiles.username ASC;

SELECT player_profiles.username, COUNT(player_friends.friend_id) AS total_friends FROM player_profiles LEFT JOIN player_friends ON player_profiles.id = player_friends.player_id GROUP BY player_profiles.username HAVING total_friends > 5;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_history.event_name, player_history.date FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_history ON player_profiles.id = player_history.player_id WHERE player_history.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY player_history.date ASC, player_profiles.username DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT age, region FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'John';
SELECT player1, player2 FROM player_friends ORDER BY player2 DESC;
SELECT username, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT username, rating FROM player_ratings WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT username, age, region, skill_level FROM player_profiles;
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE wins > 50 AND losses < 20;
SELECT player1, player2 FROM player_friends ORDER BY player1 DESC;
SELECT username, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT username, rating FROM player_ratings WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
